errors.API_ERROR: There was an error making the request - please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred - please try again later.

adding_phone_number_description:
Would you like us to communicate with you via SMS in rare cases? Leave us your phone number and we will remind you, for example, of the approaching tax due date via SMS.

You can add a phone number to your profile at any time.

*Failure to provide a phone number does not affect the use of services in the Bratislava account.
